T205 Bates / Philadelphia for sale at $18 shipped.  Card has no creases or wrinkles but has name typed on back as shown.  Nice image on front.  Paypal (gift) / check / money order accepted.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcgobal.net[/url].  Thanks!  Kevin
